name: Aung San Suu Kyi, honorific-suffix =
office1: President of the National League for Democracy
office2: General Secretary of the National League for Democracy
office4: Member of the Burmese House of Representatives, for Kawhmu
alma_mater: University of Delhi, St Hugh's College, Oxford, SOAS, University of London
awards: Rafto Prize, Sakharov Prize, Nobel Peace Prize, Jawaharlal Nehru Award, International Simón Bolívar Prize, Olof Palme Prize, Bhagwan Mahavir World Peace, Congressional Gold Medal
